description:
Get the true camping experience by cooking your dinner over the campfire. This folding grill sits just above the coals and folds down flat to easily stow in your car or pack. The wrap around rim prevents pots or pans from skating off into the fire.

  • Made of heavy-duty stainless steel
  • Raised edges on grill keep cookware from sliding
  • Folding legs lift grill 13cm above fire
  • Useable grill surface dimensions: 39 x 20cm
name: GSI Folding Campfire Grill
